alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Clinton; Howard; Montgomery; Tippecanoe (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 1:30AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Carroll, Tippecanoe, western Clinton, northwestern Howard and northeastern Montgomery Counties through 215 AM EDT... At 129 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles west of Logansport to 10 miles southeast of Williamsport. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of Carroll, Tippecanoe, western Clinton, northwestern Howard and northeastern Montgomery Counties, including the following locations... Battle Ground, Camden, Mulberry, Flora, Shadeland, Purdue University, Burlington, Clarks Hill, Rossville and Dayton. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 154 and 178. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
